title: PL VAR Controversy Galore
description:
The FC crew react to yet another weekend of controversial VAR decisions in the Premier League including West Ham's late disallowed equalizer and Virigl Van Dijk's challenge that only saw him receive a yellow card. Plus, Gab Marcotti joins the show to break down another thrilling Milan derby.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: VAR overshadows PL weekend; Rafael Leao stars in incredible Milan derby victory; Real Madrid and Barcelona continue their winning ways
